Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy appointed as the head coach of Wales
Aaron Ramsey confirmed as captain and included in the squad
Daniel James ruled out due to a hamstring injury
Vincenzo Montella expected to continue with his hybrid 5-4-1 system
Baris Yilmaz to lead the line as the target man
Turkey will be confident to finish the group at the top
Others: The first round of the UEFA Nations League 2024/25 will include Wales hosting Turkey at the Cardiff City Stadium
Both nations are a part of Group Four in the second tier of the current Nations League campaign
Turkey will start as the slight favourites but the Welsh threat cannot be overlooked
It will certainly be an exciting watch for the fans since the hosts have not scored in their last three matches while the visitors have failed to keep a clean sheet in six games
